      • update

        public void update()

      • isDestroyable

        public boolean isDestroyable()
        Returns:
        true if the object can be destroyed, false if the object cannot be destroyed.

      • isSolid

        public boolean isSolid()
        Returns:
        true if the object is solid, false if it's not.

      • conductsExplosions

        public boolean conductsExplosions()
        Returns if the game object conducts explosions through it.
        Returns:
        a boolean true if explosions should pass through the object, false if object stops explosions.

      • hasCollided

        public boolean hasCollided(GameObject obj)
        Checks if the current gameobject has collided with another gameobject obj.
        Parameters:
        obj-GameObject - to check against
        Returns:
        true if the instance collides with obj, false if they do not collide.

        Method generates a rectangle which represents the collision boundaries of the instance of GameObject
        Returns:
        a Rectangle which represents the collision boundaries of the GameObject.
